alert.note: Alert for Colfax (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 27 at 9:02PM MDT until May 27 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Colfax County in northeastern New Mexico... * Until 1000 PM MDT. * At 901 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Raton, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Raton, Sugarite, Raton Crews Airport and Sugarite Canyon State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 435 and 460. Highway 64 between Mile Markers 328 and 358. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Heavy rains may flood intersections, ditches and underpasses. Do not attempt to drive through areas where water covers the roadway. Accumulations of hail on roads can create very slick and hazardous driving conditions.
